item.description:
Everyone is Walking for Water!

We dive into the day with a four mile Walk for Water at 2:30pm. We plan to meet at Back Cove parking lot across from Hannaford supermarket. The length of the march is symbolic of the trek people take daily to gather drinking water in parts of the world where clean water is scarce and/or financially out of reach.



Celebrate our planet's most precious resource this World Water Day, Sunday March 22nd!

The international observance of World Water Day is an initiative that grew out of the 1992 United Nations Conference on Environment and Development (UNCED) in Rio de Janeiro. Countries around the globe are encouraged to implement UN recommendations. The day is a time to celebrate humanity's most essential resource.
